resources.string: Da FadCam app, da FadSec Lab Suite hissa da. Ko noor maloomat ghwaray, nu landey \'code Ogoora\' bandi click ka

FadCam yaw muft video record kawoolo app de che hech maloomat na sati. Da app yowazi pa GitHub aw rasmi zayono ke mujood de.

FadCam pa HowToMen aw Xtream Droid YouTube channels ke khpar shaway de, aw pa GrapheneOS aw noro athara zayono ke ye yawdana shaway da.
Da maraste aw nawo khabaro lapara zamung group ke shamil sha

\n Da Zay Shta:
%.2f GB / %.2f GB

Da Record Wakt (andaza):
FHD: %s
HD: %s
SD: %s

Ter Shaway Wakt:
%02d:%02d
Pati Wakt:
%s \n

string-array.name: tips_widget
string-array.item: 1/11 | Da preview band kawoolo lapara oozd press ka.
2/11 | Da saat badlawoolo lapara pa neta oozd press ka.
3/11 | Da storage widget pa wakt ke zay khayee.
4/11 | Stats widget tol videos aw zay khayi.
5/11 | Pa settings ke video kaifiyat badlawalay shay (HD, SD, FHD).
6/11 | Kam zay lary? Da zyat wakt lapara video kaifiyat kam ka.
7/11 | Pa settings ke watermark shamil ka.
8/11 | Pa settings ke pa watermark ke zay shamil ka.
9/11 | Da makhey camera ghwaray? Pa settings ke ye khwakha ka.
10/11 | Staso tanzeemat sati aw kaar kawi.
11/11 | Marasta ghwaray? Pa About ke Discord ta oorsha.

resources.string:
\n Videos: %d
Kareedaly Zay: %s \n
Da watermark qisam khwakha ka\n(Awal: Wakt sara FadCam)
Ka watermark na ghwaray no \'No Watermark\' khwakha ka. Ka watermark ghwaray no laga wakt ba onisi!
Pa watermark ke da zay maloomat shamil ka. \nGPS pakaar de \n(Awal: Band)
Da zay maloomato lapara da mobile GPS chalu ka.

string-array.name: easter_eggs_array
string-array.item: Khabardar! Da band zay de. Da nnawatlo lapara record shuru ka.
Ta patt button munda ka! Da hech na kawi lol
Zar sha! System chawidoonky de... ya shayad yaw record ye aram kri.
Kha, osa khata shwa...
Staso Bugatti sa rang de?
Za da kaar lapara na yam jor shaway. Gora ta ma hack kawal ghwaray?

string-array.name: questions_array
string-array.item: KHABARDARAY
FadCam da karoonko maloomat sati?
Pa FadCam ke ishtihar shta?
FadCam wali da zay ijazat ghwari?
FadCam internet ta wasli?
Kho maloomat pa bahir servers ke sati?
Zama videos wØ±ÙˆsØªÙ‡ Ù„Ù‡ record na sa kegi?
FadCam zama maloomat da noro sara shareek kawi?
Amoomi
Watermark wali doomra wakt nisi?
Da \'temp\' video wali de?
Za sanga da video kaifiyat badlawalay sham?
Za preview banda walay sham?
Za sanga pa watermark ke khpal zay shamil kawalay sham?
Zama tanzeemat sati?
Za da record wakt taeen kawalay sham?
Za sanga app update kawalay sham?

string-array.name: answers_array
string-array.item: FadCam da software na ghalat karona na mani. Da app na ghalat kareedana, laka da chaa jasusi ya da privacy matawol, zamung da qanoon khilaf di. Da app joroonki da app da ghalat karoolo masool na di.
Na, FadCam hech maloomat na sati.
Na, FadCam bilkul be ishtihara de.
Da watermark ke da zay maloomato shamil kawoolo lapara.
Na, FadCam internet ta na wasli.
Na, tol maloomat pa mobile ke sati.
Staso videos yowazi pa mobile ke sati.
Na, FadCam hech maloomat na shareek kawi aw na ye sati.
Amoomi
Watermark pa har frame ke shamil kegi. Somra che video oozd wi, domra wakt nisi.
Da \'temp\' video staso asli record de. Da watermark na wØ±ÙˆsØªÙ‡ pak kegi. Ka watermark kharab shi, \'temp\' file pati kegi.
Pa settings ke video kaifiyat badla ka: HD, SD, ya FHD.
Da preview bandawoolo lapara preview zay oozd press ka.
Pa settings ke zay chalu ka che pa watermark ke shamil shi. Da longitude aw latitude shamil kawi.
Ho, tanzeemat aw settings tol sati aw kaar kawi.
Da khasiyat zar razi.
Da update lapara rasmi GitHub repo wogoora.

resources.string: Zarori: Da app os jor kegi. Nawi khasiyatona warkegi.

â€¢ Naway UI design
â€¢ Videos os pa app ke sati
â€¢ Pa gallery ke da video sataloo option
â€¢ Da khwakhe watermark
â€¢ Da khe playback lapara ExoPlayer
â€¢ Pa watermark ke da zay maloomat
â€¢ Dynamic watermark options
â€¢ Da oozd press feedback
â€¢ Da nete aw wakt widget tanzeemat

â€¢ Automatic record tanzeem
â€¢ Google Drive ta automatic upload
â€¢ Da khwakhe app icons
â€¢ Da privacy lapara app lock
â€¢ Pa app ke video edit, laka trim kawal
â€¢ Aw noor zyat khasiyatona!
Khata: Video Wa Na Mundal Shwa
Video pa FadCam folder ke khe sata shwa
Video sata keday wa na shwa
Da video nom badalon baryali sho
Ghalat position ya video list tash de
Yaqeeni daa video pak kawal ghwaray?
Yaqeeni daa video(s) pak kawal ghwaray? ðŸš€ðŸ’¥
Da list na ye khwakha ka.\n(Awal: Englisi)
Da app ta da zay ijazat pakaar de che pa videos ke zay shamil kri. Mehabani oka ijazat warka.
Yaw naway version (%1$s) shta. Da update lapara, F-Droid ya zamung GitHub ta oorsha.
Yaqeeni tol videos pak kawal ghwaray?
